info.title: Avi GeoDB Object API
info.description:
CLI
```
- configure geodb <key>
- show geodb <key>
- show geodb <key> data
```

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: object name

parameters.name: refers_to
parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that refers to another Avi resource. Its syntax is refers_to=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all virtual services referring to pool p1 will be refers_to=pool:pool_p1_uuid

parameters.name: referred_by
parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that are referred by another Avi resource. Its syntax is referred_by=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all pools referred_by virtual service vs1 - referred_by=virtualservice:vs_vs1_uuid

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List of fields to be returned for the resource. Some fields like name, URL, uuid etc. are always returned.

parameters.name: include_name
parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.

parameters.name: skip_default
parameters.description: Default values are not set.

parameters.name: join_subresources
parameters.description: It automatically returns additional dependent resources like runtime. Eg. join_subresources=runtime.

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID

parameters.name: X-Avi-Version
parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.

parameters.name: X-CSRFToken
parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID

parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the object to fetch

_last_modified.description: UNIX time since epoch in microseconds. Units(MICROSECONDS).

files.description: Geo Database files. Field introduced in 21.1.1.

is_federated.description: This field indicates that this object is replicated across GSLB federation. Field introduced in 21.1.1.

mappings.description: Custom mappings of geo values. All mappings which start with the prefix 'System-' (any case) are reserved for system default objects and may be overwritten. Field introduced in 21.1.1.

name.description: Geo Database name. Field introduced in 21.1.1.

tenant_ref.description: Tenant that this object belongs to. It is a reference to an object of type Tenant. Field introduced in 21.1.1.

uuid.description: UUID of this object. Field introduced in 21.1.1.

enabled.description: If set to false, this file is ignored. Field introduced in 21.1.1.

file_ref.description: The file object that contains the geo data. Must be of type 'GeoDB'. It is a reference to an object of type FileObject. Field introduced in 21.1.1.

index.description: Priority of the file - larger number takes precedence. Field introduced in 21.1.1.

name.description: Name of the file. Field introduced in 21.1.1.

vendor.description: Source of the file data. Enum options - VENDOR_USER_DEFINED, VENDOR_AVI_DEFINED. Field introduced in 21.1.1.

description.description: Description of the mapping. Field introduced in 21.1.1.

elements.description: The set of mapping elements. Field introduced in 21.1.1.

name.description: The unique name of the user mapping. Field introduced in 21.1.1.

attribute.description: The attribute to map. Enum options - ATTRIBUTE_IP_PREFIX, ATTRIBUTE_COUNTRY_CODE, ATTRIBUTE_COUNTRY_NAME, ATTRIBUTE_CONTINENT_CODE, ATTRIBUTE_CONTINENT_NAME, ATTRIBUTE_REGION_NAME, ATTRIBUTE_CITY_NAME, ATTRIBUTE_ISP_NAME, ATTRIBUTE_ORGANIZATION_NAME, ATTRIBUTE_AS_NUMBER, ATTRIBUTE_AS_NAME, ATTRIBUTE_LONGITUDE, ATTRIBUTE_LATITUDE, ATTRIBUTE_CUSTOM_1, ATTRIBUTE_CUSTOM_2, ATTRIBUTE_CUSTOM_3, ATTRIBUTE_CUSTOM_4, ATTRIBUTE_CUSTOM_5, ATTRIBUTE_CUSTOM_6, ATTRIBUTE_CUSTOM_7, ATTRIBUTE_CUSTOM_8, ATTRIBUTE_CUSTOM_9, ATTRIBUTE_USER_DEFINED_MAPPING. Field introduced in 21.1.1.

values.description: The values to map. Field introduced in 21.1.1.
